column2: Kagro in the Morning is LIVE at 9 AM ET!
column5: Happy Eastern Orthodox Mother’s Day! It’s also—according to the KITM World Headquarters NAFTA Refrigerator Calendar—Mother’s Day in Mexico. So happy day to all you Mexican mothers! That didn’t come out quite right. But at least you didn’t have to pay for the wall. It being Monday there’s plenty to catch up with from the weekend. Unless Greg Dworkin’s computer isn’t working today in which case nothing at all happened this weekend. That we know of. Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold. Ways to Listen to Kagro in the Morning: Your options to listen LIVE: And here’s a new tip: If the player hiccups or drops the audio between the shows just go ahead and stop and restart it and things should go smoothly after that. If you miss the show or just can't listen live you can: Things you can do to support the show: Thanks for all your support and enjoy the show!
